description.ko: 날카로운 기하학적 패턴과 왜곡된 디지털 아티팩트의 최첨단 융합으로, 글리치 아트 렌즈를 통해 KURO-X의 휘발성 에너지를 표현합니다.
description.en: A cutting-edge fusion of sharp geometric patterns and distorted digital artifacts, representing the volatile energy of KURO-X through a glitch-art lens.

prompt: KURO-X brand identity, geometric glitch art style, sharp angular shapes, digital distortion, chromatic aberration, neon cyan and magenta accents, broken pixels, high contrast, futuristic aesthetic, 8k resolution, vector-influenced style.
